Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 312 Filed 07/02/21 Page 1 of 1

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK

United States of America,

-v-

Ghislaine Maxwell,

Defendant.

20-CR-330 (AJN)

ORDER

ALISON J. NATHAN, District Judge:

Defense counsel, including David Markus, are ORDERED to respond to the Government's July 1, 2021 letter motion, Dkt. No. 309, by July 9, 2021.

SO ORDERED.

Dated: July 2, 2021
New York, New York

ALISON J. NATHAN
United States District Judge

USDC SDNY
DOCUMENT
ELECTRONICALLY FILED
DOC #:
DATE FILED: 7/2/21
